snippet: The aide, Izzat Ibrahim al-Douri, an ally of the Islamic State, was the highest-ranking deputy to Mr. Hussein not caught in the American invasion.
abstract: Governor of Iraq's Salahuddin Province announces killing of Izzat Ibrahim al-Douri, highest-ranking official from Saddam Hussein’s government still at large; Douri, who became leader of Sunni insurgent group aligned with Islamic State, has been declared dead several times over years.
lead_paragraph: The aide, Izzat Ibrahim al-Douri, an ally of the Islamic State, was the highest-ranking deputy to Mr. Hussein not caught in the American invasion.

headline.main: Top Saddam Hussein Aide Reported Killed in Northern Iraq
headline.print_headline: Ex-Aide to Saddam Hussein Is Reported Killed in Iraq

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
